org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.web
Class RecommenderWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.web.RecommenderWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Refreshable, Recommender
public abstract class RecommenderWrapper
extends Object
implements Recommender

Users of the packaging and deployment mechanism in this module need to produce a Recommender implementation with a no-arg constructor, which will internally build the desired Recommender and delegate to it. This wrapper simplifies that process. Simply extend this class and implement buildRecommender().

readResourceToTempFile

public static File readResourceToTempFile(String resourceName)
                                   throws IOException
Reads the given resource into a temporary file. This is intended to be used to read data files which are stored as a resource available on the classpath, such as in a JAR file. However for convenience the resource name will also be interpreted as a relative path to a local file, if no such resource is found. This facilitates testing.

Parameters:
resourceName - name of resource in classpath, or relative path to file
Returns:
temporary File with resource data
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs while reading or writing data
